select tran.id, tran.name, tran.stage, tran.source, tran.type, u.name as owner, cus.name as customerId, con.fullname as contactsId from tbl_transaction tran join tbl_user u on tran.owner=u.id join tbl_customer cus on cus.id=tran.customerId join tbl_contacts con on con.id=tran.contactsId
tran.name like '%' #{name} '%'
tran.source like '%' #{source} '%'
tran.stage like '%' #{stage} '%'
tran.type like '%' #{type} '%'
and u.name like '%' #{owner} '%'
and cus.name like '%' #{customerName} '%'
and con.name like '%' #{contactsName} '%'
order by tran.createTime DESC limit #{start},#{pageSize}

select count(*) from tbl_transaction tran join tbl_user u on tran.owner=u.id join tbl_customer cus on cus.id=tran.customerId join tbl_contacts con on con.id=tran.contactsId
tran.name like '%' #{name} '%'
tran.source like '%' #{source} '%'
tran.stage like '%' #{stage} '%'
tran.type like '%' #{type} '%'
and u.name like '%' #{owner} '%'
and cus.name like '%' #{customerName} '%'
and con.name like '%' #{contactsName} '%'

select id, owner, money, name, expectedDate, customerId, stage, type, source, activityId, contactsId, createBy, createTime, editBy, editTime, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime from tbl_transaction where contactsId = #{contactsId}

select id, owner, money, name, expectedDate, customerId, stage, type, source, activityId, contactsId, createBy, createTime, editBy, editTime, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime from tbl_transaction where customerId = #{customerId}

select t.id, u.name as owner, t.money, t.name, t.expectedDate, cus.name as customerId, t.stage, t.type, t.source, a.name as activityId, con.fullname as contactsId, t.createBy, t.createTime, t.editBy, t.editTime, t.description, t.contactSummary, t.nextContactTime from tbl_transaction t join tbl_user u on u.id = t.owner join tbl_customer cus on cus.id = t.customerId left join tbl_activity a on a.id = t.activityId left join tbl_contacts con on con.id = t.contactsId where t.id = #{id}
